Class MessageQueue 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----MessageQueue
public class MessageQueue
extends Object
Implements a queue in which to store incoming messages. It's thread-safe.

see Object Diagram for RmiChatServer application

Version:
1.0 Oct 1997
Author:
Alex Chaffee (alex@stinky.com)

contents

MessageQueue()

dequeue()
remove a message from the list
enqueue(Message)
add a message to the list
isEmpty()
is the queue empty?
